articles.description: Dutch journalist Erik van Haren believes that Max Verstappen and Nico Hulkenberg could form an unlikely alliance but not just in F1.
articles.content: Max Verstappen and Nico Hulkenberg are great friends, according to journalist Erik van Haren. After spotting the German heading into the Red Bull camp this past weekend at the Belgian Grand Prix, Har… [+2755 chars]

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'If Stokes…': CSK star gives stunning reply on retirement U-turn for IND series - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The CSK star gave a stunning response on his retirement U-turn for the India series after England levelled the Ashes. | Cricket
articles.content: A one-word message from England skipper Ben Stokes had lured veteran all-rounder Moeen Ali to come out of Test retirement for the Ashes 2023 against arch-rivals Australia. Moeen had not played a Test… [+2208 chars]
